FOODCHAIN


About Me

Foodchain && Blockchain.


Hi, I am Foodchain, aka Fu-Chuan Chung (鍾富全 in Mandarin), Jeff from Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

As a blockchain developer, I am passionate about delving into all aspects of blockchain technology 🛵. Currently, my focus is on understanding the underlying mechanisms of the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) and developing projects related to Zero-Knowledge Succinct Non-Interactive Argument of Knowledge (ZK-SNARK⚡️). I strive to continually improve my skills and knowledge in the field of blockchain development.

In my spare time, I love listening to jazz music and also play a little bit of piano 🎺.

Here's a list of my favorite music:

  • Jacob Collier - How Deep Is Your Love (Live in Fort Lauderdale)
  • September - Earth Wind & Fire cover by Fujii Kaze
  • 20150425 [Dutch] Neighbors Complain「Just the two of us」
